description: Main entry point for the Flutter mobile application, initializing environment variables, setting up routing, and configuring theme based on device mode (TV or mobile).

classes.name: MyApp
classes.description: Root widget of the application that applies themes and routing based on environment/configuration.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Asynchronous main function serving as the app's entry point. Initializes Flutter bindings, loads environment variables, and runs the main application widget.

methods.name: _loadEnv
methods.description: Asynchronous helper method that attempts to load environment variables from a .env file, catching exceptions if the file is missing or fails to load.
